articles.description: JONATHAN McEVOY: Lewis Hamilton was denied a record-extending 98th pole position at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix in Imola - by Mercedes team-mate Valtteri Bottas.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton was denied a record-extending 98th pole position at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix in Imola by Mercedes team-mate Valtteri Bottas.
Just 0.097sec separated the two cars as the shootout … [+2084 chars]

articles.author: Indrasish Ganguly
articles.title: WATCH: Esteban Ocon Pits in the McLaren Box Instead of Renault in Imola Free Practice - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Watch Esteban Ocon end up in McLaren pit while returning from Practice at Imola. It reminds you of Lewis Hamilton back in the year 2013.
articles.content: It happened again. One of the most embarrassing acts on the grid. Many great racers have fallen prey to this, and this time it was Esteban Ocon. The Frenchman was boxing after Practice 1 at Imola whe… [+2011 chars]
